title: Simulation-Based Learning for Glaucoma Progression Prediction and Detection

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Utilization of medical imaging analysis and deep learning-based predictive models

learning_goals: Classify functional progression stages of glaucoma by analyzing retinal OCT images.
Explain the principles of deep learning models that predict glaucoma progression patterns using simulation tools.
Visualize and interpret glaucoma progression predictions based on virtual patient data in a VR environment.
Write a report evaluating the clinical applicability of glaucoma prediction models through team projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
